name: Georgia Peach Dinner Napkins, Set of 4
description:
These dinner napkins hand painted on hemp with water based fabric ink in our custom mixed Georgia Peach color.  Each napkin is individually hand painted and sewn in the Purple Bike Studio.  Because of their hand made nature, each napkin is unique, creating a warm and hand made feel to the dinner table.

Set of 4.

name: Happy Day Tea Towel
description: Hand stamped on organic cotton flour sack cloth.  These super absorbent tea towels are perfect for use in kitchens and powder rooms.

name: The "Sail the Stars" Pillow
description:
The "Sail the Stars" Pillow by Sadie and Grace.

Beautiful hand pulled silkscreen pillows on 100% Linen fronting and backing with invisible zipper.  Goose Down Inserts.  20"x20".

Spot clean or dry-clean only.

Photo Credits: Tyler Mitchell

Purple Bike supports local and regional artists and artisans.  This pillow is made in the USA by Sadie and Grace, Atlanta, GA.

description:

name: Vintage Grain Sack Pillow
description:
Made from vintage grain sacks.  Down insert included.
Measures 14"x36"

Note: No two grain sacks are identical, which adds to the charm and uniqueness of each pillow we make.  If requested, we are happy to email a picture of your grain sack pillow for approval before we ship.

name: Baby Play Quilt and Blanket in Brown/Pink
description:
Baby Play Quilt and Blanket in Brown with Pink Viking Helmets!

These adorable and soft play quilts are printed, painted, and sewn by hand in our Purple Bike studio.  Made from organic hemp summercloth and soft cotton canvas.  These artist-made quilts are the perfect place for your baby to play, rest, and create.

Measures 42x42"

Made By Purple Bike

name: Baby Play Quilt and Blanket in Blue/Mint
description:
Baby Play Quilt and Blanket in Steele Blue with Mint Polka Dots!

These adorable and soft play quilts are printed, painted, and sewn by hand in our Purple Bike studio.  Made from organic hemp summercloth and soft cotton canvas.  These artist-made quilts are the perfect place for your baby to play, rest, and create.

Measures 42x42"

Made By Purple Bike

name: Tree print by Paper and Oak
description:
This graphic tree print by Paper and Oak is available in 3 beautiful colors. Use one to hang over a bedside table, or use three in a row for a bigger impact.  Printed on matte fine art digital photography paper.

8"x8".  Available in Aqua, Blue, and Green.  

Ships Flat.

Purple Bike supports local and regional artists and artisans.  This Print is made in the USA by Paper and Oak, Atlanta, GA.

name: Elephant Family Print
description:
This adorable elephant family illustration by Paper and Oak will add the perfect accent to a nursery or child's room.  Printed on a matte fine art digital photography paper.

16"x16"

Ships in a tube.

Purple Bike supports local and regional artists and artisans.  This Print is made in the USA by Paper and Oak, Atlanta, GA.

name: Swimming Swans Print by Paper and Oak
description:
This lovely little art print by Paper and Oak is printed on a matte fine art digital photography paper.  Hang in a child's room, powder room, or hallway.  

5"x5"

Ships Flat.

Purple Bike supports local and regional artists and artisans.  This print is made in the USA by Paper and Oak, Atlanta, GA.

name: Mahal Pillow Cases (Set of 2)
description:
Rich in color and pattern, this handmade Pillow-case will add dimension and style to your bed. 

Sold as a set of 2 

300 TC Percale, 100% Cotton 

Hand printed 

20"x30" 

Machine wash cold with like colors, Tumble dry low. 

Color - Orange

name: Uma Blue Pillow Cases (Set of 2)
description:
The muted blue color and the clean pattern of these euro shams work well in a minimalist setting or in a layered look. 

Sold as a set of 2 

300 TC Percale, 100% Cotton 

Hand printed 

20"x30" 

Machine wash cold with like colors, Tumble dry low. 

Color - Blue

description:

Sold as a set of 2 

300 TC Percale, 100% Cotton 

Hand printed 

20"x30" 

Machine wash cold with like colors, Tumble dry low. 

Color - Gray

26"x26"

name: Mahal Quilt
description:
Rich in color and pattern, this handmade reversible Quilt will add dimension and style to your bed. 

Fabric 100% Cotton Voile ; Batting 100% Cotton 

Hand Screen Printed and Hand quilted 

Twin 72"x92" 
Queen 92"x92" 
King 110"x92" 

Machine wash cold with like colors, Gentle cycle, Tumble Dry. 

Color - Orange on one side and Coral Red on reverse

name: Uma Quilt
description:
A contemporary approach to a classic Blue-Brown color palette with the bold graphic patterns providing just the right drama to the mix. 

Fabric 100% Cotton Voile ; Batting 100% Cotton 

Hand Screen Printed and Hand quilted 

Twin 72"x92" 
Queen 92"x92" 

Machine wash cold separately, Gentle cycle, Tumble Dry. 

Color - Blue / Brown

name: Tara Quilt
description:

Fabric 100% Cotton Voile ; Batting 100% Cotton 

Hand Screen Printed and Hand quilted 

Twin 72"x92" 
Queen 92"x92" 

Machine wash cold separately, Gentle cycle, Tumble Dry.

name: Sleepover Featherbed
description:
A lofty 4 inch thick twin size featherbed covered in hand sewn organic cotton.  The perfect extra bed for sleepovers and the unexpected guest.

Available in 4 fabric options

name: Ivory Sheepskin Rug
description:
You could say we are just a little obsessed with sheepskin rugs.  Our Australian and New Zealand sheepskin rugs are the softest available and offer plush comfort and versatility.  Drape them over a chair, over the foot of the bed, in a nursery, or anywhere under your feet.

Our small sheepskin rugs measure approximately 2'x3'.

name: Hand Quilted Pillow
description:
One of a kind hand quilted pillow made right in our Purple Bike Playroom!  

100% Cotton.  Hidden Zipper.

18x18" down filled.

name: Oatmeal Bowls
description:
Our favorite hand crafted and glazed bowls and cups are a beautiful way to start your day (or end with a yummy scoop of ice cream!)  

These glazed terra cotta dishes are hand made in Italy and are microwave and dishwasher safe.  

A great pair with glazed terra cotta Juice cup.

Available in Gray and White.

name: Juice Cups
description:
Enjoy your breakfast with the perfect juice cup.  It's great for coffee and tea, too, and fit perfectly in your hand. These glazed terra cotta dishes are hand made in Italy and are microwave and dishwasher safe.  

A great pair with glazed terra cotta oatmeal bowl.

Available in Gray and White.

name: Vintage Homespun Quilted Christmas Stocking
description:
Made from vintage homespun cotton, these Christmas stockings will bring perfect cozy cheer to your fireplace for the holidays.  

Limited Edition, only 5 available. 

Hand stitched detail and lined in red cotton.

name: Reusable Grocery Tote
description: Using our Purple Bike hand painted fabric, we have made the cutest little grocery tote EVER!  We added backpack straps to make it perfect for walking home from the farmer's market or neighborhood grocery store.  The handy draw string insures that your goodies wont fall out.  Also the perfect bag for every day use.

name: Vintage Mexican Equipal Occasional Chair
description: Made from wood and hide.  Looks great as is, or with a sheepskin rug thrown over the seat.  Makes a great vintage accent chair for a living room, bedroom or office.

name: The "Levi" Table
description:
The "Levi" table is the perfect little side table.  Named after my mother's horse, Levi, because it is lovely, reliable, and strong.  This table is built to last forever.

Designed by Purple Bike and hand made and hand painted in Maryland by expert furniture builders.  

Measures 22.5" high by 18" diameter.

Available in three colors: Light Blue, Light Gray, and Pickle Green.

options.name: Lime Green w/ White Painted Feet

name: Spotty the Rocking Horse
description: Small vintage wooden rocking horse.

name: Vintage Grain Sacks
description:
These vintage European grain sacks are perfect for so many things.  Use them to make pillows, table runners, laundry bags, etc.  

They measure approximately 20"x50" and are available with red or blue stripe.  

Each grain sack is unique.  Subtle difference in color and size are to be expected and add to the character of each piece.
